label: Bioactivity Filter
description: Applies AI-based bioactivity prediction models to estimate ligand–target interaction probability and functional relevance. Integrates deep target–interaction graph networks (DTIGN) and ligand embedding space similarity (LigoSpace).

defaultInputs.name: Compound List
defaultInputs.tooltip: Input table of compounds (IDs and SMILES) to score.

defaultInputs.name: Target List
defaultInputs.tooltip: Targets or assays (EC50 / IC50) that bioactivity should be predicted against.

configSchema.label: Compound-Target Docking List
configSchema.tooltip: Input the compound-target docking for bioactivity prediction

configSchema.label: Available Tools
configSchema.tooltip: Select the bioactivity engine: **DTIGN** for speed, **Ligospace** for higher accuracy.
